Title: Relates to requiring emergency notices be provided to consumers in certain languages
Summary: Requires every utility corporation or municipality who sends an emergency notice to consumers to make available and provide such notice in English, Spanish, Haitian-Creole, Mandarin, Cantonese, Arabic, French, Urdu, Hindi and Tagalog.
LawCode: Amd ยง44, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring emergency notices be provided to consumers in certain languages
